FastXchecK - AI-Powered Tweet Analysis Extension V 1.1

English

 Overview
FastXchecK is a powerful Chrome extension that leverages xAI's Grok model to provide intelligent analysis of tweets. With support for 13 languages, it helps you understand the context, sentiment, and implications of social media content.

Supported Languages
1. English (en)
2. Spanish (es)
3. French (fr)
4. German (de)
5. Italian (it)
6. Portuguese (pt)
7. Dutch (nl)
8. Russian (ru)
9. Japanese (ja)
10. Korean (ko)
11. Chinese (zh)
12. Arabic (ar)
13. Hebrew (he)

Getting Started
1. Install FastXchecK from the Chrome Web Store
2. Configure your xAI API key in the extension settings
3. Select your preferred language
4. Navigate to Twitter/X and start analyzing tweets!

How to Use
1. Click the ğŸ•µï¸ button that appears on tweets
2. Wait for the analysis to complete
3. View the detailed analysis in your chosen language
4. Use the action buttons to save, copy, or share the analysis

Privacy & Security
- Your API key is stored securely in Chrome's sync storage
- No tweet content or analysis results are stored permanently
- All data processing happens through secure API calls

Support
For support or feedback, contact us at:
- Twitter: [@jmourad](https://x.com/jmourad)
- Support the development: https://buymeacoffee.com/jmourad
